attribute.name: name
attribute.description: Name used to construct vehicle archive names

attribute.name: manifest
attribute.description: Custom manifest to be included in each vehicle archive

attribute.name: earpermissionsdescriptor
attribute.description: Permisssions descriptor added to the archive if the archive requires a deployment descriptor

attribute.name: excludedfiles
attribute.description: List of files to exclude from all vehicle archives relative to the classes directory.

attribute.name: includedefaultfiles
attribute.description: Include default files in the component archive. This attribute only affects the appclient vehicle.

attribute.name: classes
attribute.description: A comma separated list of class file regular expressions to include in each vehicle that gets built, relative to the TS_HOME/classes directory

attribute.name: vehicleoverride
attribute.description: A single vehicle to process. if set, this overrides the default vehicles that are set in vehicle.properties

attribute.name: buildleveloverride
attribute.description: Set to 1 (classes), 2 (wars, jars, etc.), or 3 (ears). This overrides the default build.level property for the deliverable.

attribute.name: singleear
attribute.description: If true, bundle all vehicle component archives into a single Java EE Ear file. If false, a unique Ear will be used for each vehicle component archive. The default is false

element.name: ejb-elements
element.description: Set of filesets and/or zipfilesets to be added to the ejb component archive

element.name: client-elements
element.description: Set of filesets and/or zipfilesets to be added to the client component archive, the component archive in the EJB vehicle as well as the appclient vehicle

element.name: servlet-elements
element.description: Set of filesets and/or zipfilesets to be added to the servlet vehicle archive

element.name: jsp-elements
element.description: Set of filesets and/or zipfilesets to be added to the jsp vehicle archive

element.name: wsservlet-elements
element.description: Set of filesets and/or zipfilesets to be added to the wsservlet archives

element.name: wsejb-elements
element.description: Set of filesets and/or zipfilesets to be added to the wsejb archives

element.name: ear-elements
element.description: Set of filesets and/or zipfilesets to be added to all vehicle ear archives

element.name: jar-elements
element.description: Set of filesets and/or zipfilesets to be added to all vehicle archives
